2024 parody film

Not Another Church Movie is an upcoming American parody film written and directed by Johnny Mack. It stars Kevin Daniels, Vivica A. Fox, Lamorne Morris, Tisha Campbell, Jasmine Guy, Lydia Styslinger, James Michael Cummings, Kyla Pratt, Mickey Rourke, and Jamie Foxx.


Cast[edit]
Kevin Daniels as Taylor Pherry and Madude Hims[1]
Mickey Rourke as the Devil[2]
Vivica A. Fox[3]
Kyla Pratt[3]
Lamorne Morris[3]
Tisha Campbell[3]
Jasmine Guy[3]
Jaden Miller as Michael Junior[4]
Jamie Foxx[5] as God[6]
James Michael Cummings
Lydia Styslinger
Production[edit]
The film was shot in Savannah, Georgia in 2022.[7][8]

Release[edit]
The film is scheduled to be released in the United States on May 10, 2024.[9] It was previously scheduled to be released in October 2023.[10]
